enWisdom: The prize of the sagacious is learning wisdom

Wisdom: لَنْ يُحْرِزَ الْعِلْمَ إِلَّا مَنْ يُطِيلُ دَرْسَهُ
enWisdom: The language of knowledge is truthfulness
The conception of cognizance is through learning knowledge

Wisdom: مَنْ أَكْثَرَ مُدَارَسَةَ الْعِلْمِ لَمْ يَنْسَ مَا عَلِمَ وَاسْتَفَادَ مَا لَمْ يَعْلَمْ
enWisdom: One who increases his study of knowledge [and discussion about what he has learnt] does not forget what he knows and benefits from it that which he does not know
Gatherings of knowledge are a bounty

Wisdom: مُنَاقَشَةُ الْعُلَمَاءِ تُنْتِجُ فَوَائِدَهُمْ وَتَكْسِبُ فَضَائِلَهُمْ
enWisdom: The competition (or argumentation) of the scholars results in their gaining benefit and their earning merits

Wisdom: لَا فِقْهَ لِمَنْ لَا يُدِيمُ الدَّرْسَ
enWisdom: One who does not continue his study does not acquire deep understanding [of his subject]

Wisdom: لَا يُحْرِزُ الْعِلْمَ إِلَّا مَنْ يُطِيلُ دَرْسَهُ
enWisdom: None will attain knowledge except the one who lengthens his [period of] study
